message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $20,000 is quite a bit higher than my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $10,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly less than I can accept. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $15,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go up to $12,000.  This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to work with me.
